mapper.sql: a.id, a.name, a.count, a.status, a.create_time, a.update_time
mapper.delete: delete from search_bean a where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into search_bean ( id, name, count, status ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{count,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} )
mapper.update:
update search_bean
count = #{count,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update search_bean set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, count = #{count,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
